timeline.bodyText: Why are you updating states while the handler is getting disposed? Disposal usually indicates that openHAB is shutting down so you shouldn't delay it by creating new events.
timeline.author: cpmeister

replies.author: boehan

replies.bodyText: In the case where the thing is deactivated it might be ok. But since you can't tell the difference between thing deactivation and openhab shutdown it is better to play it safe and always treat it as a shutdown. So please remove any channel updates during disposal. If you need to send some commands to the device as part of shutdown then that is ok.
replies.author: cpmeister
